original_title: Haunted: A Last Visit to the Red House
overview: During the World War 2, Japanese soldiers raid houses in the Philippines. Thousands of men were shot and killed while women were brought to the Bahay na Pula and raped. The Bahay na Pula is being demolished. From the 1000+ comfort women, only a few remain alive, or fighting to be alive.
title: Haunted: A Last Visit to the Red House
